examples.patterns.observer

Class EmergencyBroadcastSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.patterns.observer.EmergencyBroadcastSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable

    public class EmergencyBroadcastSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObservable
    Concrete implementation of an IObserver. Acts as a rudimentary emergency messaging system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmergencyBroadcastSystem()
      No arg constructor initialises mCitizens HashMap.

      Sends a String message to any IObserver subscribed to the IObservable.
      void remove(IObserver observer)
      Removes an IObserver from the list of IObservable objects needing to be alerted when notifying.
